turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Flyboys (film).
turn.1: What was the production budget of The Flyboys?
turn.2: Producer, director and screenwriter Rocco DeVilliers worked with a $2.4 million dollar budget, meagre for a major production.
turn.4: Including pre-production, work on the film took over seven years.
turn.5: Any problems or obstacles during production?
turn.6: Once production was complete, the film was shopped around to major studios and distributors but was not successful in making any headway.
turn.8: Ultimately, despite 21 wins at numerous film festivals, "The Flyboys" was relegated to a DVD release, re-titled as "Sky Kids".
turn.10: Promotional efforts then centered on the new title.
turn.12: The film was broadcast on Sky Movies UK on August 15, 2009.
